headline: Northrop Grumman to Collaborate with Hanwha on the Republic of Korea's Mine Countermeasures Program
summary: MELBOURNE - Northrop Grumman Corporation and Hanwha have signed a Memorandum of Understanding in connection with the Republic of Korea's Mine Countermeasures Helicopter program.The agreement...
